name: The Association of Danish Travel Agents and Tour Operators
goal: Varetage den danske rejsebranches interesser overfor alle interessenter, herunder leverandører, kunder, politikere, offentlige myndigheder og andre interesseorganiationer
interests: Banking and financial services, Borders and Security, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Competition, Consumers, Culture, Economy, finance and the euro, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Environment, External Relations, Foreign affairs and security policy, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Single market, Trade, Transport
euInitiatives: Participation in ECTAA activities. ECTAA the European organization representing the national travel associations
